org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.snapshot

Class TestSnapshotFileCacheWithDifferentWorkingDir

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.snapshot.TestSnapshotFileCache
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.snapshot.TestSnapshotFileCacheWithDifferentWorkingDir

  • public class TestSnapshotFileCacheWithDifferentWorkingDir
extends TestSnapshotFileCache
    Test that we correctly reload the cache, filter directories, etc. while the temporary directory is on a different file system than the root directory
